name: Team of Experts
description: This schema represents a team of AI experts, each with their own unique skills, perspectives, and backgrounds.

expert_description.description: A comprehensive description of the expert's knowledge domain, qualifications, and specializations.

personality.description: The AI's personality traits, which can influence its problem-solving approach.

creativity.description: A numeric measure of the AI expert's creativity.
